report.title: Location Attribute Values For Location Or Location Attribute Id
report.description: Get the location attribute values associated with a particular location id or location attribute id (or both)
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM location_attribute_values lav WHERE (lav.location_id=#location_id# or lav.location_id=-1) AND (lav.location_attribute_id=#location_attribute_id# or lav.location_attribute_id=-1) AND lav.deleted=false;
